data.name: Shotgun Choke III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Shotgun Choke III

data.name: Shotgun Parts
data.description: Specialized components from shotgun-type weapons, used in crafting.

data.name: Shotgun Silencer
data.description: Moderately reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

data.name: Shotgun Silencer Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Shotgun Silencer. Moderately reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

data.name: Showstopper
data.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, stunning enemies within its radius.

data.name: Showstopper Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Showstopper.

data.name: Shrapnel Grenade
data.description: A makeshift fuze grenade that bursts into razor-sharp fragments upon detonation.

data.name: Shredder Gyro
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Signal Amplifier
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Silencer I
data.description: Slightly reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

data.name: Silencer I Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Silencer I

data.name: Silencer II
data.description: Moderately reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.  Compatible with: Rattler,  Ferro, Tempest, Arpeggio, Bettina.

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Anvil, Arpeggio, Burletta, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Venator, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest

data.name: Silencer II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Silencer II

data.name: Silencer III
data.description: Significantly reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Anvil, Arpeggio, Burletta, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Venator, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest

data.name: Silver Teaspoon Set
data.description: A shining, shimmering set  of refinement and elegance.

data.name: Simple Gun Parts
data.description: Used to craft weapons. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

data.name: Smoke Grenade
data.description: A grenade that creates a lingering smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from other Raiders.

data.name: Smoke Grenade Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Smoke Grenade

data.name: Smoke Grenade Trap
data.description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Smoke Grenade.

data.name: Snap Blast Grenade
data.description: A grenade that sticks to surfaces, dealing explosive damage after a short delay.

data.name: Snap Hook
data.description: A gadget that allows the user to scale structures and cover large distances.

data.name: Snap Hook Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Snap Hook

data.name: Snitch Scanner
data.description: Gathered from ARC Snitches. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

data.name: Snowball
data.description: A compact snowball fashioned out of the most malleable and aerodynamic snow.

data.name: Spaceport Container Storage Key
data.description: Unlocks a door in the Container Storage in Spaceport

data.description: Unlocks a door to the Ground Control Tower in Spaceport

data.description: Unlocks a door to the Trench Towers in Spaceport

data.name: Spaceport Warehouse Key
data.description: Unlocks a door in the Shipping Warehouse in Spaceport

data.name: Stable Stock I
data.description: Slightly improves dispersion & recoil recovery time. Compatible with: Rattler, Ferro, Arpeggio, Bettina, Kettle.

data.name: Stack of Movie Tapes
data.description: A stack of movie tapes, sure to please even the most pedantic of cinephines.

data.description: A tightly wound coil of metal. Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

data.name: Sterilized Bandage
data.description: A medical item that gradually restores a large amount health over time.
